404_link_not_found: The requested link could not be found.
enter_original_link: Enter the link you would like to shorten
enter_your_email_address: Please enter your official Government of Canada email address to login.
error_email_has_magic_link: Email already has a magic link. 5 minutes requesting new.
error_forbidden_resource: That URL points to a forbidden resource
error_filed_to_connect_url: Failed to connect to the specified URL
error_send_magic_link_email: Could not send magic link to email.
error_url_shorten_failed: Internal error, could not generate url
error_url_shorten_invalid: Unable to shorten link. Invalid URL.
error_url_shorten_invalid_host: URL is not registered in our system as an Official GC Domain.
error_url_shorten_invalid_scheme: Unable to shorten link. Invalid Scheme; only https is permitted.
redirect_continue: If you want to continue, please click the link above.
redirect_link_not_load: If the link does not load contact the owner of the link that sent you here.
short_service_desc: This service will shorten URLs from official Government of Canada domains. Save valuable space in your status updates while using a trusted GC domain. If your domain is not registered in our system,
short_service_desc_add_domain: request to have your domain added.
success_magic_link_sent_email: Magic link has been sent to email.
